title: Fragment, 16th–17th century
medium:
Medium: linen, cotton
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18.7 x 66.1 cm (7 3/8 x 26 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Supplementary weft floating alternatively face to face forming a design of lozenges. Of a fabric type known as Perugia towels.
